enable.title: Enable Extension
enable.subTitle: When it is enabled, if you choose this extension while creating a new profile, this extension will be applied to the new profile. Are you sure you want to enable the extension?

disable.title: Disable Extension
disable.subTitle: When it is disabled, this extension will be removed from all profiles. Are you sure you want to disable the extension?

delete.title: Remove Extension
delete.question: Are you sure you want to remove this extension?
delete.warning: If this extension is removed, it will be uninstalled in all profiles.

placeholder.instPackage: Support zip format, limit 30M. If the extension file is in crx format, change the file suffix to rar first, unzip it and recompress it to zip format
placeholder.icon: Optional, at least 60*60 pixels, ratio 1:1, support jpg/jpeg/png format, limit 1M
placeholder.extensionName: Required, please fill in the extension name
placeholder.introduction: Optional, please fill in the brief description of the extension

uploadFile.fileNotExtension: The file is not an extension

placeholder.url: Chrome Web Store URL of the extension

notes.title: Note

placeholder.name: Category name
placeholder.extension: Optional, at least 60*60 pixels, ratio 1:1, support jpg/jpeg/png format, limit 1M
